mapper.select: SELECT NVL(EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_DD, #{dayPriceDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AS dayPriceDd /* 당일특가 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,NVL(EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.SALE_END_TM, #{saleEndTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AS saleEndTm /* 판매 종료 시분, VARCHAR2(12) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AS grpFaclCd /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,NVL(EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_MIN_PRICE, #{dayPriceMinPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) AS dayPriceMinPrice /* 당일특가 최저가, NUMBER(8,22) */ ,NVL(EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_NET_PRICE, #{dayPriceNetPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) AS dayPriceNetPrice /* 당일특가 정상가, NUMBER(8,22) */ FROM EZC_FACL ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD(+) AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD(+) AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_GOODS_CD = #{partnerGoodsCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_DD AS dayPriceDd /* 당일특가 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD AS grpFaclCd /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ AS dayPriceLogSeq /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_MIN_PRICE AS dayPriceMinPrice /* 당일특가 최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.SALE_END_TM AS saleEndTm /* 판매 종료 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE /* CACHE 당일특가 */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG /* CACHE 당일특가 로그 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL /* 맵핑 시설 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL /* 맵핑 그룹 시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_DD = #{dayPriceDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 당일특가 일자, VARCHAR2(8), EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_PK(P),SYS_C0011135(C) */ AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_PK(P),FK_EZC_MAPPING_FACL_EZC_CACHE(R),SYS_C0011136(C) */ AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_PK(P),FK_EZC_MAPPING_FACL_EZC_CACHE(R),SYS_C0011137(C) */ AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = #{dayPriceLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22), FK_EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG_EZC(R),SYS_C0011138(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE /* CACHE 당일특가 */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG /* CACHE 당일특가 로그 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL /* 맵핑 시설 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL /* 맵핑 그룹 시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_DD = #{dayPriceDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 당일특가 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = #{dayPriceLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_MIN_PRICE = #{dayPriceMinPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 당일특가 최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.SALE_END_TM = #{saleEndTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 판매 종료 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_DD AS dayPriceDd /* 당일특가 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD AS grpFaclCd /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ AS dayPriceLogSeq /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_MIN_PRICE AS dayPriceMinPrice /* 당일특가 최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.SALE_END_TM AS saleEndTm /* 판매 종료 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE /* CACHE 당일특가 */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG /* CACHE 당일특가 로그 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL /* 맵핑 시설 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL /* 맵핑 그룹 시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_DD = #{dayPriceDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 당일특가 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = #{dayPriceLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_MIN_PRICE = #{dayPriceMinPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 당일특가 최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.SALE_END_TM = #{saleEndTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 판매 종료 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_DD DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE SET /* CACHE 당일특가 */ DAY_PRICE_MIN_PRICE = #{dayPriceMinPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 당일특가 최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,SALE_END_TM = #{saleEndTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 판매 종료 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND DAY_PRICE_DD = #{dayPriceDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 당일특가 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = #{dayPriceLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE /* CACHE 당일특가 */ WHERE 1=1 AND DAY_PRICE_DD = #{dayPriceDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 당일특가 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = #{dayPriceLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
